Package interfaces

Interface Observer

All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, LegalPerson, NaturalPerson
public interface Observer
Observer interface, that are updated every time the subjects executes an important action, designed based on the Observer design pattern

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair<java.lang.Double,​java.lang.Integer> bid()
    Bidding, used for actively participating in an auction
    Information getInfo()
    A getter for an observer's information, used by the subject to better perform in the auction process
    void update​(boolean winner)
    Updates the observer whether he is the winner
    void update​(Information info)
    Updates the observer with a specific information field

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update​(boolean winner)
      Updates the observer whether he is the winner
      Parameters:
      winner - tells if the observer won the auction

    • update

      void update​(Information info)
      Updates the observer with a specific information field
      Parameters:
      info - the information field set by the subject

    • bid

      org.apache.commons.math3.util.Pair<java.lang.Double,​java.lang.Integer> bid()
      Bidding, used for actively participating in an auction
      Returns:
      a pair of the current bid and the current number of won auctions

    • getInfo

      Information getInfo()
      A getter for an observer's information, used by the subject to better perform in the auction process
      Returns:
      the information of this observer
